text: Gus Green Van Sant Jr. (born July 24, 1952) is an American director, producer, screenwriter, painter, photographer, musician and author. His movies are known for having a pro-LGBT stance and messages. His movies include: Drugstore Cowboy, Good Will Hunting, My Own Private Idaho, Milk, Elephant, Psycho and Finding Forrester. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Gay men Category:LGBT artists Category:LGBT directors Category:LGBT producers Category:LGBT screenwriters Category:LGBT musicians Category:American movie producers Category:American movie directors Category:American screenwriters Category:American painters Category:American photographers Category:Writers from Louisville, Kentucky Category:Musicians from Kentucky Category:Writers from Connecticut Category:Musicians from Connecticut Category:Writers from Portland, Oregon Category:Musicians from Portland, Oregon
title: Gus Van Sant
